member.name: DML_RANDOM_GENERATOR_TYPE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify types of random random-number generator.

member.name: DML_RANDOM_GENERATOR_TYPE.DML_RANDOM_GENERATOR_TYPE_PHILOX_4X32_10
member.summary: Specifies a generator for pseudo-random numbers according to the Philox 4x32-10 algorithm.
